channel.title: Having some trouble with slayer
channel.description:
Hello, i am having a little trouble with my slayer, im using a deltascape sources.
Soo, I have been trying to change around slayer a bit, in this source, its realllly slow training, so i was trying to figure out how to change the exp u get from an assigned monster, or even set it so that when u kill any type of slayer monster, it gives your slayer exp, but i just can't get it.
Any suggestions??
MSN: redeyeballs38@yahoo.com
Help = awesome :]]]

item.title: Having some trouble with slayer
item.dc:creator: @Sinior_Jube_Head Sinior Jube Head
item.description:
@Sinior_Jube_Head wrote:

Well, just search in your client.java…

boolean slayer = true;

and below it will be something similar to this, but maybe not conventional (like maybe all in 1 line…)…

if(server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 1648) { if(playerLevel[18] >= 1){ slayer = true; addSkillXP(10 * playerLevel[18], 18); } else{ slayer = false; sendMessage("You need a slayer level of 1 to attack Crawling Hands.");} }

Simply change the experience from, example change ‘10’ to w/e. also, if you don’t want people to be able mass clik and gain tons of slayer… simply look at my thread of ‘npc death experience’ nearby to this thread.

Jube.

Read full topic

item.title: Having some trouble with slayer

item.description:

Soo, I have been trying to change around slayer a bit, in this source, its realllly slow training, so i was trying to figure out how to change the exp u get from an assigned monster, or even set it so that when u kill any type of slayer monster, it gives your slayer exp, but i just can’t get it.
